description: As the UX/UI Creative Lead at Superside, you'll have the opportunity to lead and guide our team of UX/UI designers. We work on significant strategic projects spanning from creating stunning mobile & web apps, landing pages, dashboards, and other digital products for our global brands like Meta, Google, Amazon or Twitch. In this role, you will work with our globally distributed team of top-talent creatives with plenty of professional growth opportunities.
requirements:
Bachelor's degree in Design, or similar education
7+ years of experience as a UX/UI Designer, with 2+ years in a leadership role
Strong portfolio showcasing your UX/UI design skills
Expertise in design software such as Figma, and Adobe Creative Suite
Excellent visual design skills with a focus on user-system interaction
Proven experience leading and managing a team of designers
Strong communication, presentation, and leadership skills
Excellent problem-solving abilities with a user-centric mindset
Knowledge of front-end languages: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript is a plus
Problem-solving mindset with a focus on user-centered design
Understanding of front-end languages: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript is a plus
Strong experience in Complex Design System development
Proven experience in working alongside with development team
Excellent English verbal and written communication skills to present and explain designs and deliverables to peers, executive stakeholders and customers
Encourage a culture of innovation and improvement within the team
